subject: ot: ubuntu development
body:
Hi,

I'm looking at customizing the installer on a ubuntu install cd (the 
server or "alternative" versions that don't load a gui) and was 
wondering if anyone knows where one might find the source to the version 
of debian-installer that ubuntu uses? Looked around the development site 
a bit but it seems geared towards people developing packages for ubuntu 
rather then customising it.

-- 
Are Linux users lemmings collectively jumping off of the cliff of
reliable, well-engineered commercial software?
	-- Matt Welsh
